name: [OUTWEST] DUEL
description:
The sun is low in the sky and shadows are getting long. Two rivals stand opposite each other ready to settle the bad blood between them. only one will leave and then the other will leave slightly later with a trophy.

Player 1 moves with the [A] and [D] keys and shoots with the [S] key. Player 2 moves with [J] and [L] and shoots with [K]. Players aim is always true, time your shots correctly and remember to move.

the first player to 5 wins and the game starts again.
